CustomField.formula: CASE( WEEKDAY(Date__c), 7, 'MON', 1, 'TUE', 2, 'WED', 3, 'THU', 4, 'FRI', 5, 'SAT', 6, 'SUN', NULL ) + ' ' + TEXT(DAY(Date__c)) + ' ' + CASE( MONTH(Date__c), 1, 'January', 2, 'February', 3, 'March', 4, 'April', 5, 'May', 6, 'June', 7, 'July', 8, 'August', 9, 'September', 10, 'October', 11, 'November', 12, 'December', null ) + ' ' + TEXT(HOUR(Start__c)) + ':' + RPAD(TEXT(MINUTE(Start__c)), 2, '0') + ' - ' + TEXT(HOUR(End__c)) + ':' + RPAD(TEXT(MINUTE(End__c)), 2, '0') + IF(AND(Lunch_Break_Minutes__c != 0, !ISNULL(Lunch_Break_Minutes__c)), ' Includes a ' & TEXT(Lunch_Break_Minutes__c) & ' min break. ', ' ') + IF( ISPICKVAL(Specific_Attendee_Type__c, ''), ' ', TEXT(Specific_Attendee_Type__c) & '. ') + IF(OR( ISPICKVAL(Type__c, 'Reunion'), ISPICKVAL(Type__c, 'Breastfeeding') ), TEXT(Type__c) & ' session. ', ' ') + BR()
CustomField.label: Session Info For Flow
